text: Yemwe abemeye! Ntimukegere isengesho mwasinze37 kugeza igihe musobanukiwe ibyo muvuga (mugaruye ubwenge) ndetse n’igihe mufite Janaba (mwagiranye imibonano n’abagore banyu cyangwa mwasohotswemo n’intanga mukaba mutariyuhagira) -keretse abanyura mu musigiti bitambukira-; mwiyuhagiye umubiri wose. Kandi kugeza nimuba murwaye cyangwa muri ku rugendo, cyangwa se umwe muri mwe avuye mu bwiherero, cyangwa mwabonanye n’abagore ntimubone amazi, mujye mukora banyu Tayamumu38 mwisukure mukoresheje igitaka gisukuye, mugihanaguze uburanga bwanyu no ku maboko yanyu. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Umunyembabazi, Ubabarira ibyaha
